content: Attention all FHIR fans around the globe: we're expanding the Furore team. If you want to help build the tools that make FHIR even simpler and help our customers implement FHIR, then see the vacancies on Stackoverflow: http://bit.ly/2lqO4Ha and http://bit.ly/2lO5tua. Or visit our website: http://fhir.furore.com. Donâ€™t quite see yourself in the profile but still interested in doing FHIR all day every day? We still want to hear from you! Send me a direct message if you're interested.
